product_name: Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant Injector - 2 oz.
long_description: Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant Injector offers simple, straightforward sealing or transfer of sealant for a single mountain bike tire. Graduated 2 oz. injector makes application of sealant simple, with no mess or waste of sealant. The 2 oz. amount is suitable for sealing most mountain bike tires. Allows for easy transfer of sealant from one tire to another. Dual-threaded brass adapter fits both Presta and Schrader valves. Tire Sealant seals punctures up to 1/4 in. on standard and tubeless tires.
short_description: Stan's NoTubes Tire Sealant Injector offers simple, straightforward sealing or transfer of sealant for a single mountain bike tire.
